channel.title: [REPOST]£-Project Simscape-£ 14 Plcaces Left - Not To Much Time
channel.description:
[img]http://www.freewebs.com/elloolechap/hello.bmp[/img] hello, I'm working on my newest project called Simscape. >>>>::::About The Server::::<<<< This is the beginning of a revolutionary server, it will have all working skills, full Falador, Lumbrige, Verrock, Camelot, Jad, and will have better shops, more stuff to buy what you please, money made off of skills such as mining, woodcutting, and felching. all working skill menus saying what can be done and how, full castle wars, and full dueling, easy navigation, with no commands so if you like cheating like a nub leave NOW! and a hole lot more... its something worth waiting for. these are the things i have added to it so far-- - skill capes - pk in wild only - full mining - full smithing - full woodcutting - all skills work - four randoms - full faldor - customized some skills - full verrock - full lumbrige - almost full Camelot - all shops in there places in faldor, verrock, lumbrige, and camelot - extra shops - new menu's - word censor - Full GlobalObjects - Full Castle Wars! - Full Duel Arena! - Full Character Changing, saving and Beards! - all Potions work with doses! - Fully working prayer (no head icons though) - Fully working barrows with kill count - added some skill menu's - updated site! - updated the forums! - and some more i cant remember right now... stuff not added yet - - full runes shop - all armor shop - rare's shop - add some more skill menu's - arrows shop - theaving stalls - mining, wood cutting, smithing shop - and a client (more to come upon the release) and thats all i really lack...
[COLOR=blue][SIZE=4] ....::::THE TEAM::::....[/SIZE][/COLOR] If you wish to sign up to the team please fill out these apps and post the on the support section of the forums ([url=http://z11.invisionfree.com/Simscape/index.php?act=id]http://z11.invisionfree.com/Simscape/index.php?act=id[/url]) (please if you want to sign up for admin make sure you are a experienced coder)
Admin/staff - what you do you want to be in it? - ([s]server coder[/s]/ client coder/ website coder/ or all) what is some of your previous work? do you have any? if you were to rate your self as a coder what would it be? how would you help out with the server? - can you be reliable? why be Admin/staff? -
moderator - how would you help with the community? can you be reliable? will you NOT abuse your powers? what would you moderate? - (the forums or the game? or both?)
if i post "Accepted" on the forums, that means that you got the job, but if i post "Declined" you did not get the job.. when i post "Working" that means that there doing there job. once accepted please go to the support section and go to the sticky that says all acceded applicants look here and do as instructed. Once in i will PM you a secret key code to actses to the "staff talk" forums so there only staff can post and see whats on there. once accepted if you have not replyed on here or the forums your validation will drop, and you will be declined.
(PS all staff communicate trough the games forums --- [url=http://z11.invisionfree.com/Simscape/index.php?act=idx]HERE[/url])
[s]server coder's -[/s] FULL! 1.me 2.s4f3 up n00b (from mopar) (registerd on forums) 3.runescape3 (from mopar) (registerd on forums)
site coder's 1.me 2.(empty) 3.(empty)
client coder's 1.(empty) 2.(empty) 3.(empty)
moderator's (watches over, makes sure no rules are broken) 1.xx blitz xx (zammy!! on mopar) (registerd on the forums) 2.(empty) 3.(empty) 4.(empty) 5.(empty)
tester's 1.mc kibba (from rune-server) (not registerd on forums) 2.rukki (mopar) (not registerd on forums) 3.(empty)
as you can see we are still taking applications antell all places are field. NOTE!! Once all places are filled the server will be ready for testing!
Visit the server's official site! ([url=http://HTTP:/www.freewebs.com/elloolechap/]HTTP:/www.freewebs.com/elloolechap/[/url])

item.title: [REPOST]£-Project Simscape-£ 14 Plcaces Left - Not To Much Time
item.dc:creator: @rune_unlimited rune unlimited
item.description:
@rune_unlimited wrote:


hello, I’m working on my newest project called Simscape.

::::About The Server::::<<<<
This is the beginning of a revolutionary server, it will have all working skills, full Falador, Lumbrige, Verrock, Camelot, Jad, and will have better shops, more stuff to buy what you please, money made off of skills such as mining, woodcutting, and felching. all working skill menus saying what can be done and how, full castle wars, and full dueling, easy navigation, with no commands so if you like cheating like a nub leave NOW! and a hole lot more… its something worth waiting for.
these are the things i have added to it so far–

  • skill capes

  • pk in wild only

  • full mining

  • full smithing

  • full woodcutting

  • all skills work

  • four randoms

  • full faldor

  • customized some skills

  • full verrock

  • full lumbrige

  • almost full Camelot

  • all shops in there places in faldor, verrock, lumbrige, and camelot

  • extra shops

  • new menu’s

  • word censor

  • Full GlobalObjects

  • Full Castle Wars!

  • Full Duel Arena!

  • Full Character Changing, saving and Beards!

  • all Potions work with doses!

  • Fully working prayer (no head icons though)

  • Fully working barrows with kill count

  • added some skill menu’s

  • updated site!

  • updated the forums!

  • and some more i cant remember right now…
    stuff not added yet -

  • full runes shop

  • all armor shop

  • rare’s shop

  • add some more skill menu’s

  • arrows shop

  • theaving stalls

  • mining, wood cutting, smithing shop

  • and a client
    (more to come upon the release)
    and thats all i really lack…

                            [COLOR=blue][SIZE=4] ....::::THE TEAM::::....[/SIZE][/COLOR]

If you wish to sign up to the team please fill out these apps and post the on the support section of the forums (http://z11.invisionfree.com/Simscape/index.php?act=id)
(please if you want to sign up for admin make sure you are a experienced coder)

Admin/staff -
what you do you want to be in it? - (server coder/ client coder/ website coder/ or all)
what is some of your previous work? do you have any?
if you were to rate your self as a coder what would it be?
how would you help out with the server? -
can you be reliable?
why be Admin/staff? -

moderator -
how would you help with the community?
can you be reliable?
will you NOT abuse your powers?
what would you moderate? - (the forums or the game? or both?)

if i post “Accepted” on the forums, that means that you got the job, but if i post “Declined” you did not get the job…
when i post “Working” that means that there doing there job.
once accepted please go to the support section and go to the sticky that says all acceded applicants look here and do as instructed.
Once in i will PM you a secret key code to actses to the “staff talk” forums so there only staff can post and see whats on there.
once accepted if you have not replyed on here or the forums your validation will drop, and you will be declined.

(PS all staff communicate trough the games forums — HERE)

server coder’s - FULL!
1.me
2.s4f3 up n00b (from mopar) (registerd on forums)
3.runescape3 (from mopar) (registerd on forums)

site coder’s
1.me
2.(empty)
3.(empty)

client coder’s
1.(empty)

3.(empty)

moderator’s (watches over, makes sure no rules are broken)

5.(empty)

tester’s
1.mc kibba (from rune-server) (not registerd on forums)
2.rukki (mopar) (not registerd on forums)
3.(empty)

as you can see we are still taking applications antell all places are field.
NOTE!! Once all places are filled the server will be ready for testing!

Visit the server’s official site! (HTTP:/www.freewebs.com/elloolechap/)
